### DebugSubsectionRecordBuilder() {#a07bc0313677210eea784ec2554d1f985}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>DebugSubsectionRecordBuilder::DebugSubsectionRecordBuilder (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/codeview/debugsubsectionrecord">DebugSubsectionRecord</a> &amp; Contents)</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> this to copy existing subsections directly from source to destination.

For example, line table subsections in an object file only need to be relocated before being copied into the PDB.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/codeview/debugsubsectionrecord-h/#l00058">58</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/codeview/debugsubsectionrecord-h">DebugSubsectionRecord.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/debugsubsectionrecord-cpp/#l00055">55</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/debuginfo/lib/debuginfo/codeview/debugsubsectionrecord-cpp">DebugSubsectionRecord.cpp</a>.
